thread.section_title: Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel, great position and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Nice hotel, great position and friendly staff - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CJTW
title: Nice hotel, great position and friendly staff
text:
This is a great hotel, it's well placed for visiting NYC and the staff are friendly. The rooms are small (but they are in NYC at this price) and ours could have done with a little refresh.
However the staff were all friendly and helpful, the maid service, concierge, doorman and porters were all a great help. The bar is good and the food there was good value.
Overall a reasonable hotel, in a great location that is really helped out because the staff are friendly.
